experience.title: Frontend Developer
desc: Optimized the company's UI library within 12 months, leading to an improvement in user satisfaction
Implemented a E2E testing platform (Puppeteer), leading to a 15% reduction in post-release issues and ensuring a more robust and reliable software product.
Worked together with the product development and UX teams, providing constructive feedback to enhance code quality and efficiency

experience.title: Senior Frontend Developer
desc: Utilized modern front-end frameworks, particularly ReactJS, to enhance user experiences.
Streamlined web optimizations to achieve faster load times and scalable functionality, enhancing the efficiency of conversion funnels.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer and Coach
desc: Conducted workshops on ReactJS and JavaScript, teaching assistants and significantly enhancing issue resolution efficiency and code quality.
Enhanced code quality offering constructive feedback on React code reviews, improving maintainability and adherence to coding standards and best practice.

experience.title: Cto & Co Founder
desc: Implemented LAMP stack, resulting in 1 million monthly visits and improved user experience. Relational databases included MySQL and PostgreSQL.
Collaborated with product manager to accurately render complex data, resulting in highly performant user interfaces and a 30% increase in average session duration.

experience.title: Founder & Main Developer
desc: Orchestrated the creation and deployment of a dynamic platform, seamlessly integrating PHP, MySQL, jQuery, and Bootstrap for comprehensive functionality and design.
Engineered a scalable architecture to support platform growth, optimizing performance across diverse functionalities.
